messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Book Sale Prices
messages.msgSnippet: Alan, Please sent me a list! Tom Alan Bale  wrote: With regard to my book sale the prices shown on the used books list are to be
messages.messageBody:
Alan,
Please sent me a list!
Tom


Alan Bale <abale@...> wrote:
With regard to my book sale the prices shown on the used books list are to be discounted by 30% they are NOT the prices you pay as some people seem to think.

Alan Bale
